attributes.action: INVESTIGATE THE NON-COVID EXCESS DEATHS IN THE UK
attributes.additional_details: The UK government initiated a substantial campaign into awareness about COVID, even before there were any excess deaths. There is clear evidence that excess deaths are occurring now that have nothing to do with COVID, yet the government are not responding.
attributes.background: According to the ONS, registered deaths in England and Wales have been above average for most of the last 3 months and have been higher for 12 of the last 14 weeks than any of the previous 7 years.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Investigations of specific deaths are a matter for coroners and the justice system.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
